item.text: You can also visit Crypto Academy
DAO - Distributed Autonomous Organisation as a DApp - Distributed Autonomous Application
I wrote about these terms on Crypto Academy
DAO - Distributed Autonomous Organisation as a DApp - Distributed Application
DAO - Distributed Autonomous Organisation is a [[DApp]] - Distributed Application which purpose is governance of the organisation.
I wrote about these and related terms on my Crypto Academy Wiki.

DAO - Distributed Autonomous Organisation is a [[DApp]] - Distributed Application which purpose is governance of the organisation. To put it simple DAO is a complex DApp consisting of a system of contracts - rules by which organisation is functioning expressed in programming language.
A distributed application (DApp) is a software that is executed or run on multiple computers within a network.
item.title: Distributed Applications

story.text: DAO - Distributed Autonomous Organisation is a [[DApp]] - Distributed Application which purpose is governance of the organisation. To put it simple DAO is a complex DApp consisting of a system of contracts - rules by which organisation is functioning expressed in programming language.

A distributed application (DApp) is a software that is executed or run on multiple computers within a network.
